originalText.text: Olsi Beci is a phenomenal photographer with an eye for capturing the perfect moment. He took amazing photos of me in NYC, showcasing his deep knowledge of the best spots in the city. Each shot was meticulously framed, leaving me with stunning, unforgettable images. If you're in need of a top-notch photographer, Olsi Beci is your go-to choice.

originalText.text: My husband and I are so happy that we chose Nyc ProVideo to capture our wedding day 4 years ago. Olsi is not only such a wonderful person to work with but also very talented, artistic and creative, something that comes through in all of his photos and videos.  He's worth EVERY penny! His work is beautiful!!!

originalText.text:
We recently hired Olsi Beci to capture the highlights of our "First Time Home Buyer's Seminar" and we couldn't be happier with the results. From start to finish, Olsi was a true professional and an absolute pleasure to work with.

The Seminar was a fast-paced, high-energy event, and Olsi was able to seamlessly blend in and capture all of the key moments. He has a keen eye for detail and was able to capture candid shots of our attendees, as well as more formal group shots.

The final images were absolutely beautiful. Olsi managed to capture the energy and excitement of the Seminar, and the images truly reflected the atmosphere of the event. They were well composed, and the editing was top-notch.

We highly recommend Olsi to anyone looking for a great professional event photographer. He is an expert in his field and truly knows how to capture the essence of an event. Thank you Olsi  for providing us with such beautiful and high-quality images!

originalText.text: I absolutely love Olsi’s work. He is the best photographer I’ve worked with in NYC. I’ve used his services for birthdays and personal sets. His work is amazing and his service is very professional. Furthermore, it comes with very reasonable and affordable prices. I highly recommend him to anyone ☺️

originalText.text: I am not usually a fan of my pictures but NYC ProVideo is so amazing at what they do and captured such beautiful pictures that I was instantly in love. Olsi's energy is amazing. He instantly lifts up your mood. He is always running around and captures the perfect candid moments. I would definitely recommend them and will definitely be working with them again:)
